name: Cupid (Frozen Fire Studio, Adrian, RoopGandhi)
description:
Drag To Move.
Mouse up or lift finger to fire.
Try to use the least arrows possible!

Credits!

- 2 of our Interns worked on the art and code for the game and shall be added here once they create Itch.io accounts :/
- Roopjot for practicing and contributing to the code
- Adrian for the rest of the code and polish
- https://opengameart.org/ for the sounds and background image!
